member.name: M:op.Controllers.DataTransformController.FetchAndConvertXmlToJson(System.Int32)
member.summary: Fetch the data from the API and convert it to JSON.
member.remarks: This endpoint fetches the data from the API, evalutes it against the xml schema schema.xsd and converts it to JSON.
member.param: The unique identifier used to fetch data from the API.
member.returns: A JSON representation of the fetched data.
